text: Nikoloz "Nika" Gilauri (, ; born 14 February 1975) is a Georgian politician. He was Prime Minister of Georgia from 6 February 2009 to 30 June 2012. He was Minister for Energy (2004–2007) and Minister for Finance (2007–2009) and First Vice Prime Minister of Georgia (2008–2009). == Other websites == |- |- |- Category:1975 births Category:Prime Ministers of Georgia Category:Government ministers of Georgia (country) Category:Politicians from Tbilisi Category:Living people Category:21st-century politicians from Georgia (country)
title: Nika Gilauri
